Since this has not been translated yet and part 4 was recently released along with a part 5 in the works, I will give a rough translation of what is going on this chapter. 

Continuing from part 2, Kaori quit the tennis club and started spending all her time having sex with her kohai and her kohai's boyfriend.(BF), and her own bf her childhood friend (CF). (CF) thinks they are not actually studying at the study sessions (obviously).
